name: Space Rogue (itch)
description:
#LOWREZJAM

WASD to move
Space to jump
Mouse to look around and shoot

Your mission is to steal three holographic blueprints from this ship. There are security droids defending the ship, shoot them on sight. After getting all blueprints go back to your ship and return to your base. Good luck.

Developed by:
Allan David - Programming and Game design
Guilherme Santos - Art and Game design
Bernard Machado - Music and Sounds
